As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(c)

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: Blue collar comedy rules the roost with this hilarious farce starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall and D.J. Qualls as buddies who are mistaken for Army Reservists and sent to the Middle East - but when they are accidentally dropped into Mexico, they misread the situation and set about trying to "liberate" a besieged village from a demented drug lord. Danny Trejo costars.

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Attack of the Killer Donuts
programme.desc: A chemical accident turns ordinary donuts into bloodthirsty monsters and three friends must track them down as they begin eating their victims. It's up to them to destroy the donuts and save their sleepy little town.

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic.

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: Blue collar comedy rules the roost with this hilarious farce starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall and D.J. Qualls as buddies who are mistaken for Army Reservists and sent to the Middle East - but when they are accidentally dropped into Mexico, they misread the situation and set about trying to "liberate" a besieged village from a demented drug lord. Danny Trejo costars.

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A young teenager, Abe (Jacob Zachar), manipulates the unsuspecting help of his alcoholic Uncle Mort (John Malkovich) to buy a boat from a con man named Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman).

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama.

programme.title: Nemr: No Bombing in Beirut
programme.desc: In this special filmed in both Lebanon and America, Nemr puts together an hour of uproarious comedy capturing thousands of people from the Middle East and America laughing at the same jokes, told by the same man. From his childhood in America, to his later years in Lebanon, Nemr recounts his life and touches on childhood, family, relationships, religion, war and the power of perspective.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Undertow (2004)
programme.desc: A backwoods teenager (Jamie Bell) and his little brother who suffers from an eating disorder must go on the run from their crazed, vengeful uncle (Josh Lucas) in this crime thriller that harkens back to the rural-set B-movies from the '70s. Shiri Appleby costars.

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike Comedy with Rob Gronkowski
programme.desc: Sports and comedy come together in this comedy special hosted by Rob Gronkowski himself and featuring the standup comedy of Juston McKinney, Finesse Mitchell, Jay Larson, John Caparulo and Lenny Clarke.

programme.title: Battle Scars
programme.desc: Luke Stephens (Zane Holtz) shows up on his brother Nicky's (Ryan Eggold) doorstep after a tour of duty in Afghanistan. Suffering from both Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and physical wounds that are unseen, Luke wants nothing more than to forget the war, but his veteran father (David James Elliott) won't let him. Then, at a local strip club run by a ruthless killer, Luke crosses paths with Michelle (Heather McComb), who leads him into a violent world every bit as dangerous as the brutality he is trying to leave behind.

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.

programme.title: Undertow (2004)
programme.desc: A backwoods teenager (Jamie Bell) and his little brother who suffers from an eating disorder must go on the run from their crazed, vengeful uncle (Josh Lucas) in this crime thriller that harkens back to the rural-set B-movies from the '70s. Shiri Appleby costars.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama.(n)

programme.title: Across the Line
programme.desc: Mattie is a top ice hockey player tipped to be selected by one of the top teams in the National Hockey League, but his plans are jeopardized by his hustling brother and the corrosive racial tension at his high school.(n)

programme.title: Word is Bond
programme.desc: This documentary ﬁlm by Sacha Jenkins examines the transformative power of lyrics in the world of hip-hop music. What was born on the streets of the South Bronx has now taken root globally and the young poets of New York have helped to spawn regional dialects everywhere. Through dynamic archival footage, in-depth interviews and excursions with artists like Nas, Tech9, J Cole, Rapsody and Anderson. Paak, the film explores the many dimensions that hip-hop poetics occupy.(n)

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: Marc and Fred go to war when they are refused a double bed at a Christian B&B. They win their court case and go back. Triumph turns to terror when a Russian neo-Nazi checks in. Their weekend of fun becomes a bloody battle.(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with.(n)

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks.(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship.(n)

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Oz (Matthew Perry) is a miserable dentist living with Sophie (Rosanna Arquette), his shrew of a wife. Things get even worse when hitman Jimmy "The Tulip" (Bruce Willis) moves in next door. Sent by Sophie to Chicago to rat out Jimmy to the Gogalak gang, Oz meets and falls in love with Cynthia (Natasha Henstridge), Jimmy's estranged wife. Oz returns home only to discover Sophie's hired Jill (Amanda Peet), his perky dental hygienist, to kill him.(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.(n)

programme.title: Black Sabbath - The End of The End
programme.desc: Chronicles the final tour from Black Sabbath. On February 4th, 2017, Black Sabbath takes the stage in Birmingham, the city where it all began, to play the 81st and final gig of the tour and bring down the curtain on a career that spanned almost half a century. The cameras are taken into the heart of the action, getting up close and personal with the band as they perform genre-defining hits, from 'Iron Man' to 'Paranoid' to 'War Pigs', among others. The special also features a studio performance of some of their songs not played on the tour.(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed.(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar.(n)

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.(n)

Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes-overbearing support of his crude best friend, Kyle (Seth Rogen), his smothering mother (Anjelica Huston) and an inexperienced therapist (Anna Kendrick). Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.

programme.title: Queen of the Desert
programme.desc: Gertrude Bell (Nicole Kidman) rejects the stifling rigidity of life in turn-of-the-century England, leaving it behind for a chance to travel to Tehran. She begins her lifelong adventure across the Arab world, a journey marked by danger, a passionate affair with a British officer (James Franco), and an encounter with the legendary T.E. Lawrence (Robert Pattinson).

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.

programme.title: The Killer Inside Me
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff (Casey Affleck) in a small West Texas town of the 1950's tries with increasing desperation to hide his tortured, sadomasochistic affair with a prostitute (Jessica Alba), as well as the fact that he is a serial killer. Kate Hudson costars in this gritty, hard-boiled drama.

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.

programme.title: Nemr: No Bombing in Beirut
programme.desc: In this special filmed in both Lebanon and America, Nemr puts together an hour of uproarious comedy capturing thousands of people from the Middle East and America laughing at the same jokes, told by the same man. From his childhood in America, to his later years in Lebanon, Nemr recounts his life and touches on childhood, family, relationships, religion, war and the power of perspective.

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Robert De Niro directs this story of a young CIA agent during the Cold War whose dedication to work costs him his innocence and his soul. Academy Award winners Matt Damon and Angelina Jolie also star.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: In the future, the Navy has developed a fighter jet piloted by artificial intelligence. The jet is placed on an aircraft carrier in the Pacific, under the command of stern Capt. George Cummings (Sam Shepard). The Navy has also chosen three pilots for a new generation of stealth fighter-bombers, designed to instantly respond to sightings of terrorists anywhere in the world. When the computer develops a mind of its own, it's the humans who must stop it before it precipitates a nuclear war. Also starring Jessica Biel, Josh Lucas and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
programme.desc: Gary Oldman stars as a retired secret agent who is pulled back into the game to ferret out a Soviet agent in MI6. Also starring Academy Award winner Colin Firth, Tom Hardy, Mark Strong, Ciaran Hinds, and Benedict Cumberbatch.

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: Anthony (Taylor John Smith) is a standout player on his high school's basketball team with everything going for him: a killer three-point shot, a loving girlfriend (Zazie Beetz) and a chance at a scholarship to Cornell. But Anthony's dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his volatile father (Michael Shannon), a hard-drinking writer whose compulsive gambling threatens to derail the lives of both his wife (Carla Gugino) and son. Anthony must summon the strength to step out from his father's shadow and reclaim his future.

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: In the midst of a global crisis, the USS Alabama receives an unconfirmed order to launch its nuclear missiles - signaling the start of World War III. The tension quickly rises as the sub's respected commander (Gene Hackman) and his brilliant executive officer (Denzel Washington) clash over the validity of their orders, battling each other for control of the sub. Also starring Viggo Mortensen and James Gandolfini.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: In the future, the Navy has developed a fighter jet piloted by artificial intelligence. The jet is placed on an aircraft carrier in the Pacific, under the command of stern Capt. George Cummings (Sam Shepard). The Navy has also chosen three pilots for a new generation of stealth fighter-bombers, designed to instantly respond to sightings of terrorists anywhere in the world. When the computer develops a mind of its own, it's the humans who must stop it before it precipitates a nuclear war. Also starring Jessica Biel, Josh Lucas and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.

programme.title: Momma
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy living in a trailer park carries on with his schoolwork and daily chores petrified at the thought of being taken away from his mother.

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: Blue collar comedy rules the roost with this hilarious farce starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall and D.J. Qualls as buddies who are mistaken for Army Reservists and sent to the Middle East - but when they are accidentally dropped into Mexico, they misread the situation and set about trying to "liberate" a besieged village from a demented drug lord. Danny Trejo costars.

programme.title: I, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Daniel Blake (Dave Johns) is a man out of time. He's a widowed woodworker who's never owned a computer and lives according to his own common sense moral code. After a heart attack leaves him unable to work and the state welfare system fails him, Daniel must stand up and fight for his dignity and lead a one-man crusade for compassion that transforms the lives of a single mother (Hayley Squires) and her two children.

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Firefight
programme.desc: Transferred to Detroit to put a local SWAT team through a training regimen, LAPD Lieutenant Paul Cutler finds himself the target of a homicidal genius who is protected by government officials.

programme.title: Texas Rangers
programme.desc: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the duty of cleaning up the West.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon.(n)

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Firefight
programme.desc: Transferred to Detroit to put a local SWAT team through a training regimen, LAPD Lieutenant Paul Cutler finds himself the target of a homicidal genius who is protected by government officials.(n)

programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in and directs this inspiring drama about a college professor who challenges the entrenched racism and prejudice of the 1930's by assembling and training a first-class African-American debate team, a talented group that makes its way to a national championship against Harvard University. Forest Whitaker, Jurnee Smollett and Nate Parker costar in this fact-based, critically acclaimed film.(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis.(n)

programme.title: The Flying Scotsman
programme.desc: This inspiring sports drama is the true story of Scottish bicyclist Graeme Obree, who broke the world one-hour cycling record in 1993 on a bicycle he designed and built from scrap metal and washing machine parts. Jonny Lee Miller, Laura Fraser, Brian Cox and Billy Boyd costar.(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the first manned mission to Mars, commanded by Luke Graham (Don Cheadle), lands safely on the red planet, but is soon met with catastrophe. Haunted by a cryptic last message from Graham, NASA launches the Mars Recovery Mission to investigate and bring back survivors. Confronted with nearly insurmountable dangers, but propelled by deep friendship, the team finally lands on Mars and makes a discovery that explains everything.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: Brilliant medical student Michael (Oscar Isaac) meets beautiful dance instructor Ana (Charlotte Le Bon) in late 1914. Their shared Armenian heritage sparks an attraction that turns into a romantic rivalry between Michael and Ana's boyfriend (Christian Bale), an American photojournalist. As the Ottoman Empire crumbles into war-torn chaos, their conflicting passions must be put aside as they join forces to get themselves to safety.(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.(n)

programme.title: Assassination Games
programme.desc: Jack and Derek are the two best assassins in the world. Conway is a master sharpshooter and Chase is equally skilled with a knife. The two rivals must form an uneasy alliance to take down the head of a drug cartel backed by the DEA.

programme.title: SCB: Jack vs. DeGale
programme.desc: Relive Badou Jack taking on James DeGale in a 12-round war to unify super middleweight titles.

programme.title: SCB: Stevenson vs. Fonfara I
programme.desc: In anticipation of the June 3 rematch between light heavyweight champion Adonis Stevenson and contender Andrzej Fonfara relive their classic 2014 battle.(c)

programme.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
programme.desc: Kevin Smith, the filmmaker, is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his widely reported massive heart attack in February. But before he nearly died backstage, he killed onstage discussing his marriage, his kid, his friends and his work (or lack thereof).

programme.title: War and Peace
programme.desc: The gloves are off as Donald Trump fights a 360-degree battle to keep the presidency. He's taking shots at those who stand to threaten it, and is at war against the "deep state" of the FBI, CIA, and the Department of Justice. Stories covered include Michael Cohen's connection to a Russian oligarch, Trump's attempts to undermine the Mueller investigation, the scuttling of the Iran deal, and the Senate confirmation hearing for Trump's controversial CIA Director pick, Gina Haspel.(c)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special.

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: Adam Hitchens is a London-based conservationist, husband and father who has found himself struggling amidst fraught economic pressures at work. He decides to move his family from London to Ireland and to take a job surveying an Irish forest. He moves his family to a millhouse deep in the idyllic countryside of Ireland. When the family arrives, they get to work rebuilding their new home. They meet their neighbors, but not everyone approves of their arrival. The locals are unfriendly and begin to make them feel unwanted.

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Sharyn Alfonsi talks to American League All Star Josh Donaldson about his rough early life and how overcoming a challenging childhood helped him in becoming the player he is today. Plus, Jeff Glor profiles the first American female athlete to win gold in both Summer and Winter Paralympic Games, Alana Nichols - who's setting her competitive sights on a new event at the Summer Games in Brazil.

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as Ditch Brodie, a daredevil skydiving instructor who falls hard when a sexy, mysterious beauty (Natassja Kinski) walks through his door looking for a lesson and then plunges to her death during a parachute jump. Suddenly, Brodie finds himself hurled headlong into a nightmare world of intrigue and deceit - caught in a deadly game of cat and mouse with the Russian mafia.

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: A vengeful game of one-upmanship turns deadly in this urban thriller about a hotshot young attorney (Ben Affleck) and a recovering alcoholic (Samuel L. Jackson) whose minor fender-bender devastates both of their lives and quickly leads to an escalating war of dirty tricks and manipulation. William Hurt, Toni Collette, Dylan Baker, Amanda Peet and Sydney Pollack costar in this provocative, acclaimed film from director Roger Michell ("Notting Hill").

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey.

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.

programme.title: SCB: Stevenson vs. Fonfara II
programme.desc: In anticipation of light heavyweight world champion Adonis Stevenson taking on two-division champ Badou Jack, relive Stevenson in a rematch against Polish contender Andrzej Fonfara.(c)

programme.title: SCB: Jack vs. Cleverly
programme.desc: In anticipation of light heavyweight world champion Adonis Stevenson taking on Badou Jack, relive two-division champ Jack squaring off against Nathan Cleverly for the light heavyweight title.(c)

programme.title: SCB: Stevenson vs. Sukhotsky
programme.desc: In anticipation of light heavyweight world champion Adonis Stevenson taking on two-division champ Badou Jack, relive Stevenson sending Dmitry Sukhotskiy to the floor several times before a definitive knockout.(c)

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo.

programme.title: Shark Babes
programme.desc: A group of sexy marine biologists discover how sharks emit an erotic sound that no woman can resist. But will their research take them to new heights or simply turn them into shark babes bent on overthrowing mankind with sensuality?

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.

programme.title: Cold Comes the Night
programme.desc: As the proprietor of a motel, Chloe is in financial trouble and has quietly allowed a prostitution operation to run on the premises. One night, Topo (Bryan Cranston), a nearly-blind career criminal, and his driver stop over at the motel while en route to deliver cash to an unknown boss. An accident causes Topo to lose his driver, and their car is taken to the police impound with the money still inside. Robbed of his money and his surrogate set of eyes, Topo takes Chloe and Sophia hostage.

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Showtime Boxing on CBS: Thurman vs. Porter (R)
programme.desc: Knockout artist Keith "One Time" Thurman (26-0, 1 ND, 22 KOs) defends his welterweight belt against "Showtime" Shawn Porter (26-1-1, 16 KOs) in a marquee matchup of elite fighters in their prime. Plus, undefeated super welterweights Jarrett Hurd (17-0, 11 KOs) and Oscar Molina (13-0-1, 10 KOs) battle for contender status. Live from Brooklyn's Barclays Center. REPLAY.(n)

programme.title: Thurman vs. Chaves
programme.desc: Welterweights Keith "One Time" Thurman vs. Diego Chaves. Classic fight.(n)

programme.title: SCB: Thurman vs. Soto Karass
programme.desc: Welterweight Keith "One Time" Thurman vs. Jesus Soto Karass. Classic fight.(n)

programme.title: Best in Sex: 2018 AVN Awards
programme.desc: The AVN awards celebrate outstanding achievements in the world of adult entertainment. Awards are given out in categories like Best New Starlet, Most Outrageous Sex Scene, Best Group Sex Scene and Most Spectacular Boobs.(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat.(n)

programme.title: Operation Odessa
programme.desc: This is a true crime documentary featuring a Russian mobster, a Miami playboy and a Cuban spy who sold a Soviet submarine to a Colombian drug cartel for $35 million. A mid-'90s gangster epic that hopscotches from Brooklyn to Miami and Cali to Moscow, the film tells the story of three friends who set out to hustle the Russian mob, the Cali cartel and the DEA for the score of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Lord of War
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this drama thriller as Yuri Orlov, a Russian immigrant who becomes a millionaire in the Eighties and Nineties by reselling weapons from his politically crumbling homeland to "hot spot" regions around the world, all while marrying a beautiful woman (Bridget Moynahan), dodging a determined federal agent (Ethan Hawke), and occasionally facing the immorality of his chosen profession. Jared Leto and Ian Holm costar in this film from writer/director Andrew Niccol ("Gattaca," "The Truman Show").(n)

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.(n)

programme.title: Gangster Land
programme.desc: At the height of 1920s prohibition, notorious gangster Al Capone recruits amateur boxer Machine Gun Jack McGurn to help fight the Irish & protect his empire on the crime-ridden streets of Chicago. When the Italian mob becomes the most lucrative criminal organization in the country, tensions build with "Bugs" Moran of the Irish Northside gang, igniting a brutal gang war.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)

programme.title: Lord of War
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this drama thriller as Yuri Orlov, a Russian immigrant who becomes a millionaire in the Eighties and Nineties by reselling weapons from his politically crumbling homeland to "hot spot" regions around the world, all while marrying a beautiful woman (Bridget Moynahan), dodging a determined federal agent (Ethan Hawke), and occasionally facing the immorality of his chosen profession. Jared Leto and Ian Holm costar in this film from writer/director Andrew Niccol ("Gattaca," "The Truman Show").(n)

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: Welcome to Greenleaf, a picture-perfect Indiana town where the high school is the proud focus of attention. On the night of the Oscars telecast, the town's center of attention is Greenleaf teacher Howard Brackett when a former student, who's now a winning actor, tells the audience of millions that Howard is gay. Kevin Kline plays stunned Howard, who scrambles to go forth with his wedding to devoted Emily (Joan Cusack) and assert his manliness.

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama.

programme.title: In a Perfect World...
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments.

programme.title: Away From Her
programme.desc: A lovingly devoted couple feel their unshakable longtime bond begin to unravel thanks to the ravages of Alzheimer's Disease in this remarkable tour-de-force of acting and powerfully emotional writing from first-time director Sarah Polley. Gordon Pinsent, Julie Christie and Olympia Dukakis star.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration.

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in and directs this inspiring drama about a college professor who challenges the entrenched racism and prejudice of the 1930's by assembling and training a first-class African-American debate team, a talented group that makes its way to a national championship against Harvard University. Forest Whitaker, Jurnee Smollett and Nate Parker costar in this fact-based, critically acclaimed film.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: Despite the Falling Snow
programme.desc: In 1950s Moscow, communist Katya secretly spies for the Americans in the Cold War arms race. When she lands her biggest assignment, stealing secrets from rising government star Alexander, the last thing she expects is to fall in love with him. Reconciling her passion for him with her beliefs about communism means making the greatest sacrifice, a sacrifice that Alexander only uncovers thirty years later.

programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in and directs this inspiring drama about a college professor who challenges the entrenched racism and prejudice of the 1930's by assembling and training a first-class African-American debate team, a talented group that makes its way to a national championship against Harvard University. Forest Whitaker, Jurnee Smollett and Nate Parker costar in this fact-based, critically acclaimed film.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson.

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life.

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship.

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser.(n)

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: An adventure that tells the true story of Arthur (Clive Owen) and his bond of brotherhood with Lancelot (Ioan Gruffudd) and the Knights Of The Round Table as they fight for freedom and those they love. Co-starring Keira Knightley.(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself.(n)

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct.(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues.(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct.(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.(n)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.

programme.title: Strip Club Slayer
programme.desc: When a strip club goer is killed, the dancers hire a bouncer to protect themselves. As the sexual tension grows between one of the women and the bouncer, the mystery of the dangerous killer unravels.

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room.

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated.

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno.

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs.

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.

programme.title: Body of Deceit
programme.desc: Alice (Kristanna Loken) is a ghostwriter for a famous author. She is halfway through the work of his new book, but cannot write anymore. A year has passed since she had a terrible accident in Malta where she was staying with her husband Max (Antonio Cupo) in his family villa and was in a coma for two weeks. Since then, she has been suffering from depression and has recurrent and cryptic nightmares. Max persuades her to go back to Malta in the hopes that something will unblock her mind so she can start working again and meet her deadline.

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life.

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement.

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse.

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Hard-to-please Aurora (Shirley MacLaine) is looking for love, while her daughter (Debra Winger) has her own set of family problems. Also starring Jack Nicholson.

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.

programme.title: You, Me and Him
programme.desc: Two female lovers, one a career driven lawyer (Lucy Punch), the other a fun-loving, pot-smoking layabout (Faye Marsay), have an annoying Casanova neighbor (David Tennant). While neither woman ever wanted children, both end up pregnant, creating conflicts that cause each to re-examine their outlook on life and their relationship.

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Hard-to-please Aurora (Shirley MacLaine) is looking for love, while her daughter (Debra Winger) has her own set of family problems. Also starring Jack Nicholson.(n)
