programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas.(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis.(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.(n)

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs.(n)

programme.title: Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work
programme.desc: This insightful, hysterically funny documentary follows comedienne Joan Rivers through a year of her life while looking back on her groundbreaking, barrier-breaking career as one of the first women to make a name for herself in the tough, male-dominated world of show business.(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself.(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy.(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.(n)

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama.(n)

programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop (Jackie Chan) is transformed into a superhuman warrior by an all-powerful amulet. Chan's charm and physical antics compensate for the so-so plot. Chan also co-executive produced. Gordon Chan directed. (cc).

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy
programme.desc: A Southern matron forges a bond with her black chauffeur in the racially-divided 1960s South. Only when he is retired and she is confined to a home for the elderly do the two fully realize that they've been friends and kindred spirits all along. (cc).

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship. (cc).

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: A lonely writer falls for his computer's operating system, which has the voice of a woman and the ability to grow and learn. Their relationship quickly turns more intimate, but in time their differences begin to outweigh their similarities. Meanwhile, he struggles with a difficult divorce from his childhood sweetheart. (cc).

programme.title: The Human Stain
programme.desc: Well-acted but superficial adaptation of Philip Roth's novel about a light-skinned black college professor (Anthony Hopkins) who has been passing as white. Nicole Kidman, Ed Harris, Gary Sinise. Robert Benton directed. (cc).

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in the year 2018, John Connor leads the human resistance against the computer network Skynet as the machines grow more aggressive than ever before. John was raised to believe in a specific version of the future, but that future begins to shift with the appearance of mysterious former death-row inmate Marcus Wright. As John and Marcus venture into the mechanical heart of Skynet's operations, they make a terrifying discovery about the potential fate of the human race. (cc).

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.desc: When her 6-year-old goes missing, a mother alerts the police and an investigation is quickly underway. After several fizzled leads, the mother and lead detective refuse to give up. Based on the novel "Still Missing" by Beth Gutcheon. (cc).

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Boston cop Thomas Craven discovers his grown daughter Emma led a double life after she is shot to death on his doorstep. Craven investigates her murder and soon uncovers evidence of corporate cover-ups and a government conspiracy. Meanwhile, mysterious government agent Darius Jedburgh sets out to erase all evidence of the crime. (cc).

programme.title: Annabelle Creation
programme.desc: A group of orphaned girls are taken in by a doll maker and his wife, who are still grieving the death of their daughter. However, they are soon terrorized by a haunted doll that's lurking within the couple's house. (cc).

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes puts his strength and intellect to the test as he teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a formidable new adversary who is determined to destroy England. (cc).

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: Three female African-American mathematicians provide crucial calculations for NASA's space race against the Soviets, all while dealing with the racist and sexist assumptions of their white co-workers. (cc).

programme.title: Away We Go
programme.desc: A thirtysomething couple (John Krasinski and Maya Rudolph) expecting their first child set off on a cross-country search for the perfect place to live. After learning that his parents are moving to Europe, the duo realize that they can lay down roots anywhere. They visit a number of old friends in different cities and learn valuable lessons about parenting. Directed by Sam Mendes. Maggie Gyllenhaal, Allison Janney, Jeff Daniels. (cc).

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: A genetically mutated scientist's alter ego runs amok in this adaptation of the Marvel comic. (cc).

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: A young boy befriends a wise tree monster while coping with bullying and the terminal illness of his mother. He moves in with his grandmother as his mom's condition deteriorates, and uses his imagination and friendship with the monster to escape reality. (cc).

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
programme.desc: Kids provide for themselves during summer vacation after their babysitter dies. (cc).

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore enchants as a Chicago newspaper editor who relives her hellish teen years while on an undercover assignment at a local high school. Barrymore's great, but the film celebrates the fact that her character wins over the same type of “in crowd” that taunted her as a teen. David Arquette costars as her cool brother. Raja Gosnell is the director, and Barrymore served as executive producer. (cc).

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services. (cc).

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: A self-centered ad exec (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to read women's minds---much to his chagrin. Clever premise, but the one-note joke wears thin. Helen Hunt. Directed by Nancy Meyers ("Something's Gotta Give"). Bette Midler has a cameo. (cc).

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A lonely time traveler meets the love of his life, and attempts to win her heart time and again after a glitch in the process renders them complete strangers. Later, he repeatedly travels back to his past in order to perfect his present. (cc).

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: A grizzled older cop is removed from a car theft case and partnered with a younger detective, but that doesn't stop him from interfering with the investigation, leaving his new partner stuck in between doing what's right and doing his job. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars as Davy Crockett and Dennis Quaid is Sam Houston in this somber re-creation of the famous 1836 siege in San Antonio. Historically accurate, but unexciting. Jason Patric, Patrick Wilson. Directed by John Lee Hancock (“The Rookie”). (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, he agrees to help an accounting clerk look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Once upon a Time in Mexico
programme.desc: A corrupt CIA agent teams up with a guitar-playing gunslinger to stop a coup South of the Border. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Tales from the Darkside The Movie
programme.desc: A mixed bag of three horror stories based on the works of Stephen King, Arthur Conan Doyle and Michael McDowall. Betty: Debbie Harry. Andy: Christian Slater. Halston: David Johansen. Drogan: William Hickey. Preston: James Remar. Carola: Rae Dawn Chong. Wyatt: Robert Klein. Bellingham: Steve Buscemi. Directed by John Harrison. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In this sequel, Batman and idealistic DA Harvey Dent join forces to arrest and prosecute Gotham City's crime lords. But the deranged Joker raises the stakes by declaring all-out war on the forces of law and order. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Amelia
programme.desc: This biopic spans the life of aviator extraordinaire Amelia Earhart (Hilary Swank), whose famous voyage across the Atlantic was tragically overshadowed by her mysterious disappearance five years later. Richard Gere, Ewan McGregor. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Indignation
programme.desc: A young Jewish atheist attends college in 1951 Ohio, where he clashes with the school's established social order and his overbearing parents' hopes for his future. At the same time, he falls for an attractive, complicated classmate named Olivia. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: A sisterhood of well-to-do New Yorkers rally around their friend when they learn her husband is having an affair. Remake of the 1939 classic. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Anywhere but Here
programme.desc: A flighty mother and her grounded daughter clash over the direction of their lives after leaving their drab Midwestern town for a more glamorous life in L.A. In time, a family tragedy forces both of them to grow up. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: During the 1660s, a teenage maid (Scarlett Johansson) in the Netherlands becomes a model for painter Johannes Vermeer (Colin Firth). Absorbing and visually rich; the film nicely captures Vermeer's artistic process. Tom Wilkinson. The film scored three Oscar nominations, including Best Cinematography. Peter Webber's directorial debut. Based on the novel by Tracy Chevalier. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: A bomber has rigged a bus with a bomb and a cop must get on-board while it is traveling to figure out how to get the passengers off. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Bounty hunter Milo tries to bring his reporter ex-wife Nicole to justice after she skips bail in order to investigate the cover-up of a murder. As she tries to give him the slip, the duo bicker incessantly and work through some of the problems that ended their marriage. (cc).

programme.title: Sweetbitter
programme.desc: When Tess forgets her wallet at the restaurant, she goes back to discover what happens after-hours: shift drinks. Simone teaches her about the coding of our tongues, leading Tess to become even more enthralled by Simone. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A psychic facilitates a dead banker's return to protect his girlfriend from the man who murdered him. (cc).

programme.title: Underworld Blood Wars
programme.desc: In the latest installment of this action-horror franchise about a conflict between vampires and werewolves, undead warrior Selene battles a ruthless new werewolf leader in order to protect her child, who's a hybrid of both races.

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: In an effort to eradicate virus-carrying roaches, an entomologist unknowingly creates a species of giant bug that feasts on human flesh. When bodies start to pile up, she wages a war on the beasts in the dank regions of New York's subway tunnels. (cc).

programme.desc: A housewife deals with her husband after he becomes possessed by a ghost.

programme.desc: An aspiring poet tries to ask out the object of his affections at a rowdy high-school graduation party. (cc).

programme.desc: A single mom moves into a new home with her three children in order to better care for her comatose son James. But when James wakes up, the family soon discover that his recovery is really a manifestation of the evil lurking within their house. (cc).

programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Heart Attack Is
programme.desc: Philip (James Avery) has a heart attack after Will sneaks him high-fat foods. Dr. Kevarkian: Dominic Hoffman. Paramedic: Darryl Sivad. Will: Will Smith. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will's scheme to improve his grades by fixing up his professor (Phil Morris) with Hilary backfires when Hilary finds fault with the man. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Rhetta: Rachel True. Jackie: Tyra. Will: Will Smith. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: You've Got to Be a Football Hero
programme.desc: Will uses booze to prove his manliness while competing with a football hero (Cylk Cozart) who wants to score with Jackie (Tyra); Ashley learns beauty is in the eye of the beholder. Judith: Robin Quivers. Louis: Craig Shoemaker. Billy: DeJuan Guy. Robert: Marc Robinson. Will: Will Smith. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Boyz II Men star in a holiday episode about Will's scheme to get the group to perform at Nicky's christening. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Helen: Jenifer Lewis. Vivian: Daphne Maxwell Reid. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will (Will Smith) pays for putting off studying for a midterm until the last minute, and Ashley (Tatyana M. Ali) pays for staying out late on her first date. Philip: James Avery. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A crack Detroit detective pursues a pal's killer through the plastic jungle of Southern California, where he tweaks authority, tumbles with the bad guys and bends the rules.(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A down-and-out Detroit youth with a dead-end job and an unstable home life pursues a career as a rap artist. Rabbit has just been dumped by his girlfriend, forcing him to move back in with his emotionally unstable mother. Convinced his skills as a rapper are his only real hope at a better life, he makes music with a group of underground artists. But as a white rapper, Rabbit struggles to be taken seriously in a predominantly black musical tradition. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Stomp the Yard
programme.desc: An L.A. step-dancer tries to fit in at an Atlanta college and gain acceptance from a fraternity.(n)

programme.title: Just Wright
programme.desc: A tough-talking physical therapist named Leslie Wright (Queen Latifah) is hired to rehab an injured NBA star, whose fiancée leaves him when it looks like his career is over. Eventually, Leslie finds herself falling for the athlete and she discovers the feeling may be mutual. But after his rehab is complete, his fiancée returns to reclaim her man. Directed by Sanaa Hamri. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.
